form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Johnson introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend Public Law 86–272 to expand the prohibition of State taxation relating to certain solicitation of orders.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Interstate Commerce Simplification Act of 2025.
Section 101(d) of Public Law 86–272 (73 Stat. 555) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (1) by striking and at the end,
in paragraph (2) by striking the period at the end and inserting ; and, and
by adding at the end the following:

the term solicitation of orders means any business activity that facilitates the solicitation of orders even if that activity may also serve some independently valuable business function apart from solicitation.
